name: Red Eclipse
description: Red Eclipse is a first-person shooting game that supports single and multiplayer game modes. Players can instantly edit maps and is action-oriented with high tactical freedom. Thrilling plot, beautiful image and vivid sound will bring you an immersive shooting experience.

en_US.description: Red Eclipse is a first-person shooting game that supports single and multiplayer game modes. Players can instantly edit maps and is action-oriented with high tactical freedom. Thrilling plot, beautiful image and vivid sound will bring you an immersive shooting experience.
en_US.name: Red Eclipse

zh_CN.description: Red Eclipse是一款第一人称的射击游戏，支持单人和多人游戏模式。玩家们可以进行即时的地图编辑，以自身行动为导向，拥有极高的战术自由度。惊险刺激的剧情、精美的画面和生动的音效，将带给您身临其境的射击体验。
zh_CN.name: Red Eclipse
